name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with over 10 years of experience, specializing in **frontend development** and **responsive design**. Proven track record in enhancing **frontend performance optimization** and maintaining robust **design systems**. Proficient in **wireframing** and creating **mockups** to ensure a seamless user experience. Skilled in conducting **code reviews** to uphold highest coding standards and optimize **frontend architecture** using modern **frontend tooling** such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**.
Additionally, experienced in integrating **AI coding tools** and driving collaboration across teams by leveraging **effective communication** skills. Strong self-motivated professional, committed to delivering high-impact, maintainable solutions in diverse environments while ensuring adherence to compliance standards. My background in full stack development and proficiency in technologies including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Node.js**, and cloud platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS** further bolster my capabilities to contribute to team objectives.

experience.responsibilities:

•	Led the creation of wireframes and mockups for complex UIs, collaborating effectively with stakeholders to ensure alignment with user needs and expectations.
•	Conducted thorough code reviews to maintain high coding standards and shared best practices within the team, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and self-motivation.
•	Optimized existing front-end architecture to enhance application efficiency, utilizing modern front-end tooling for increased productivity and responsiveness.
•	Utilized AI coding tools to streamline development processes, integrating advanced features into the front end, which improved user engagement in applications.
•	Established strategies for testing frontend components using **Jest** and **Cypress**, resulting in a comprehensive coverage of unit and integration tests, ensuring the reliability of the interface.
•	Collaborated closely with back-end developers to ensure seamless integration of APIs and services, achieving smooth data flow and improved user experiences.
•	Implemented best practices for responsive design across various devices, achieving a consistency rate of over **95%** in user experience across platforms.
•	Engaged in effective communication and collaboration within cross-functional teams, contributing to successful project delivery timelines and exceeding client expectations.

Focused on **frontend development** by crafting dynamic and user-focused applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring responsive design and frontend performance optimization.

Promoted adherence to best practices in code quality and frontend architecture, contributing to an **80%** increase in the team's delivery speed for feature enhancements through efficient use of design systems.
